interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hatfields & McCoys [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2013/06/27
Store: Kevin Costner  (Actor, Producer),     Bill Paxton  (Actor),     Kevin Reynolds  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
Product Description: ['Bonded by their oath to the same flag, two confederate soldiers, “Devil” Anse Hatfield (Kevin Costner) and Randall McCoy (Bill Paxton), return home seeking peace after tireless months of battle. Their expectations are quickly shattered when a murder based on misunderstandings and an illicit love affair trigger warfare between former comrades and their clans. This historic feud teeters on the brink of an all out civil war as friends and neighbors join opposing sides in a rivalry that would ultimately shape American History.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, History', 'Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Noel Fisher, Hatfield and McCoy Productions, LLC, Matt Barr, Jena Malone, Sarah Parish, Bill Paxton, Sam Reid, Kevin Costner, Jilon VanOver, Darrell Fetty, Boyd Holbrook, Andrew Howard, Mare Winningham, Ronan Vibert, Powers Boothe, Kevin Reynolds, Tom McKay, Joe Absolom, Herb Nanas, Tom Berenger, Lindsay PulsipherNoel Fisher, Hatfield and McCoy Productions, LLC, Matt Barr, Jena Malone, Sarah Parish, Bill Paxton, Sam Reid, Kevin Costner, Jilon VanOver, Darrell Fetty, Boyd Holbrook, Andrew Howard, Mare Winningham, Ronan Vibert, Powers Boothe, Kevin Reynolds, Tom McKay, Joe…   See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': '25343070', 'Director': 'Kevin Reynolds', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '4 hours and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 31, 2012', 'Actors': 'Kevin Costner, Bill Paxton, Matt Barr, Tom Berenger, Powers Boothe', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Producers': 'Kevin Costner, Herb Nanas, Darrell Fetty', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: I had already seen most of it on TV. But I missed some, so I decided to order it. I loved it. It was really a sad thing that went on, but I enjoyed the movie.
Review Title: Loved It !!!!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Interests**: The user has a strong inclination towards historical dramas, particularly those depicting significant American narratives and conflicts. The interest in a film centered around the Hatfields and McCoys suggests a preference for stories with deep emotional resonance and historical context.

- **Media Format Preference**: The user prefers high-quality viewing experiences, as indicated by their choice of Blu-ray format. This highlights an appreciation for well-produced cinema, likely valuing visual and auditory fidelity.

- **Engagement with Content**: The user engages with content they’ve previously viewed, indicating a desire for comprehensive experiences. Their review mentions watching parts of the film on TV before purchasing, reflecting a commitment to fully experiencing the story.

- **Emotional Response**: They express strong emotional engagement with the content, appreciating the storytelling despite its sad themes. This suggests a preference for narratives that invoke deeper emotions and provoke thought.

- **Rating Behavior**: The user rated the film highly (5.0), showcasing a tendency to favor works they genuinely enjoy. Their overall positivity toward the film indicates an openness to exploring further content in the same genre.

Overall, this user profile indicates a film enthusiast with a focus on historical narratives, a preference for high-quality media formats, and a genuine appreciation for emotionally gripping storytelling.
